Description:
Apt Resources, a leading recruitment agency in the hospitality industry, is seeking a friendly and energetic Waitress/Server to join the team at UHNWF - VVIP. As their Waitress/Server, you will play an integral role in creating a positive dining experience for the family and their esteemed guests and ensuring their satisfaction.Serve food and drinks in an efficient and timely manner
Ensure tables are cleaned and reset after each meal
Collaborate with kitchen staff to ensure smooth and seamless service
Be aware of high-quality service standards expected in UHNWFJob Details
